 <a href="
http://ufopaedia.org/index.php?title=Installing_(OpenXcom)" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://ufopaedia.org/index.php?title=Installing_(OpenXcom)</a>

=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
**If you bought the steam version and have it installed already, 
leave it where it is. (IE: X:######Steamsteamappscommonxcom ufo defenseXCOM )**
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=


NOTE: The version included is the steam version. You DO NOT have to have Steam installed 
to run this version.


Extract folder XCOM_UFO somewhere (IE: C:gamesXCOM_UFO )

-Open the OpenXcom 1.0 installer. 

-Check the "data patch" **requires internet connection** and "desktop shortcut" boxes.
  -included the "universal-patch.zip" 

-The installer will ask you where you want to put OpenXcom (IE: c:games ).

-Right after it will ask where the X-Com installation is (IE: C:gamesXCOM_UFO or Steam... ). 

-The installer will copy all the required files and folders automagically and create an 
OpenXcom shortcut on the desktop.



OPTIONAL 64bit support:

Extract all folders from "openxcom-v1.0-win64.zip" into OpenXcom directory.
